snippet.title: Teaser - Stable #31
snippet.description:
Teaser for the latest stable build #31 (February 14th, 2014).

The update contains
- new terrain generators
- growing trees
- villages and cities
- module showcase: Wood and Stone
- new user interface
- 2D renderer (Dwarf Fortress style)
- cinematic camera mode
- ...

To read more about the release, please read
http://forum.terasology.org/threads/happy-valentines-day-have-a-stable-build-with-a-well-timed-bug.973/

----------------------------------------­----------------------------------
Music by Chrisk
----------------------------------------­----------------------------------

Download Launcher: https://github.com/MovingBlocks/TerasologyLauncher/releases
Download Stable: https://github.com/MovingBlocks/Terasology/releases
Download Latest: http://jenkins.terasology.org/job/Terasology/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/distributions/Terasology.zip

Source: https://github.com/MovingBlocks/Terasology

Official forum: http://forum.terasology.org/

German forum: http://terasologyforum.de/
